Name: system_ligand_chains
Description: List of all ligand asymmmetric chain ids in a protein-ligand system

Name: system_ligand_chains_BIRD
Description: List of all ligand chain BIRD ids in a protein-ligand system

Name: system_ligand_chains_ECOD
Description: List of all ligand chain ECOD tnames in a protein-ligand system

Name: system_ligand_chains_PANTHER
Description: List of all ligand chain PANTHER ids in a protein-ligand system

Name: system_ligand_chains_Pfam
Description: List of all ligand chain Pfam ids in a protein-ligand system

Name: system_ligand_chains_SCOP2
Description: List of all ligand chain SCOP2 ids in a protein-ligand system

Name: system_ligand_chains_SCOP2B
Description: List of all ligand chain SCOP2B ids in a protein-ligand system

Name: system_ligand_chains_UniProt
Description: List of all ligand chain uniprot ids in a protein-ligand system

Name: system_ligand_chains_auth_id
Description: List of all ligand author chain ids in a protein-ligand system

Name: system_ligand_chains_entity_id
Description: List of all ligand entity ids in a protein-ligand system

Name: system_ligand_chains_length
Description: List of all ligand chain lengths in a protein-ligand system

Name: system_ligand_chains_num_residues
Description: List of all ligand chain lengths in a protein-ligand system

Name: system_ligand_chains_num_unresolved_heavy_atoms
Description: List of number of unresolved heavy atoms for all ligands in a system.

Name: system_ligand_chains_percent_occupancy_over_threshold
Description: Percent occupancy over threshold for all ligand in a system.

Name: system_ligand_chains_percent_outliers_chirality
Description: The fraction of chirality outliers (see https://www.wwpdb.org/validation/XrayValidationReportHelp) in each ligand in a given system.

Name: system_ligand_chains_percent_outliers_clashes
Description: The fraction of clash outliers (see https://www.wwpdb.org/validation/XrayValidationReportHelp) in each ligand in a given system.

Name: system_ligand_chains_percent_outliers_density
Description: The fraction of density outliers (see https://www.wwpdb.org/validation/XrayValidationReportHelp) in each ligand in a given system.

Name: system_ligand_chains_percent_outliers_geometry
Description: The fraction of geometry outliers (see https://www.wwpdb.org/validation/XrayValidationReportHelp) in each ligand in a given system.

Name: system_ligand_chains_percent_processed_residues
Description: The number of residues which were processed in the validation report for each ligand in a given system.

Name: system_ligand_chains_percent_rscc_over_threshold
Description: The fraction of Real-Space Correlation Coefficient above a given threshold for all ligands in a system.

Name: system_ligand_chains_percent_rsr_under_threshold
Description: The fraction of Real-Space R-value above a given threshold for all ligands in a system.

Name: system_ligand_chains_unknown_residue_count
Description: The number of unknown residues for all ligands in a system.

Name: system_ligand_num_residues
Description: Number of ligands in a system.
